metadata.title: CVE-2022-40897 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Python Packaging Authority (PyPA) setuptools before 65.5.1 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service via HTML in a crafted package orcustom PackageIndex page. There is a Regular Expression Denial of Service(ReDoS) in package_index.py.

criterions.comment: python-setuptools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
python-pip: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
